name: Black And White Stripe Handmade Cotton Panties Elegant And Sexy Underwear Custom Sizes
description:
Sexy and elegant handmade knickers in classic black and white stripes with a twist.  The panties are constructed in panels with the front and back section stripes arranged vertically and the bridging sections at the sides having horizontal stripes.

Legs and waist have a soft black lace trim and small black satin bow adorning the centre front.  The waistband is concealed plush elastic.

The panties have a gusset lining of matching fabric.

Shown here on a 35 inch hip mannequin, this is ideal for hip sizes 34 to 36 inches.  While fabric stocks last I can custom make to fit most sizes, at no extra cost.  Please check with me first regarding availability.

name: Handmade Black Cotton Garter Belt With Black Lace And Satin Bows Flower Patterned Suspender Belt
description:
Sexy handmade garter belt in an all cotton print of colourful flowers on a black background.  The flowers include roses and anemones in shades of cream, pink aqua and deep lilac.  There's a front panel of black lace and a black lace trim all around the edge of the belt.  The centre front waist is adorned with a black satin bow, and there's a small black satin bow above each of the back garters.

The belt comes supplied with one set of garters: these are broad black satin fronted, plush backed elastic with black metal adjusters and hooks. The grips are black plastic with silver metal fronts. All my garter belts have detachable garters to enable you to ring the changes.  

The belt has a concealed elastic waistband which will stretch from 24 inches to 32 inches. It doesn't look best fully stretched, though, and is best suited to waist sizes up to 30 inches. While fabric stocks last, I can make this to fit most sizes. There is no extra cost for custom ordering. Custom orders can usually be completed in a week to ten days. Please check before ordering regarding availability and turnaround times.

name: Sexy Handmade Panties French Script In Black On White Je t'aime Cotton Knickers
description:
Handmade cotton panties in soft ivory adorned with words of love in English and French in flowing black script.  This stunning print has a background resembling pages from a French dictionary overlaid with larger font script in black which reads 'Love', 'Je t'adore', and 'Je t'aime'.

There's a black lace trim around the waist and legs, and a small black satin bow on the centre front waist.  The knickers have a concealed plush elastic waistband, and a gusset lined in matching fabric.

Suitable for 34-36 inch hips, they are shown here photographed on a 35 inch hip mannequin. 

While fabric stocks last I can make in most sizes at no extra cost. Just drop me a line first to check availability.

name: Cream And Black Camisole Stripes With Damask Bodice All Cotton Handmade Custom Sizes
description:
Elegant camisole handmade in two black and cream cotton prints. The bodice is a damask style print of closely packed motifs including fleurs de lys, crowns, flowers and scrollwork in black on a cream background.

The main body is a classic black and cream quarter inch vertical stripe.

Bodice and hem are trimmed in natural coloured flower patterned lace, and there's a dainty cream satin double rose adornment on the centre front bodice.

The straps are narrow, cream coloured, satin fronted, plush backed elastic with white metal adjusters. 

Shown here on a 34 inch bust mannequin, this is suitable for size 34 bust with a medium (B-C) cup size bodice. (UK size 10-12)(US size 8-10) The underbust measurement is 32 inches. The length along the centre back seam (which starts at around underarm level) is 13 inches,making it hip skimming. 

While fabric stocks remain, I can make this to fit most sizes. Please check with me first regarding availability and turnaround time. Custom orders cost the same as readymade.

Wear as underwear, sleepwear or streetwear.

Photographed with matching striped mini bloomers, which aren't included but can be purchased separately.

name: Black Rose Sleepmask All Cotton Handmade Eye Shade
description:
Handmade luxury cotton sleepmask, comprised of two black and grey prints with three layers of soft cotton flannel between them, ensuring superior comfort and light exclusion.  

The print used for the front side of the mask is one of closely packed large scale black roses with grey and white accents.    The back print is another tonal pattern of silvery grey on charcoal flowers and foliage in the style of Jacobean tapestry.  

The loop of elastic that keeps the mask firmly anchored in place is covered in matching fabric for enhanced good looks.

Measurements are approx 9 inches in length, and 3.5 inches in breadth at the widest point. Unstretched the back loop measures approx 14 inches; fully stretched, it's about 24 inches. 

If you would like to commission a similar mask in a different print or size I will be happy to send photo swatches to help you make your choice. There is no extra charge for custom ordering.

Comes ideally packaged for gift giving in a close fitting plastic sleeve with 'Sweet Dreams' cardboard backing which also includes laundry instructions (cool hand-wash recommended) .

name: Black Polka Dot Suspender Belt All Cotton Handmade Retro Garter Belt
description:
Handmade cotton garter belt/suspender belt.  The classic retro print has bold quarter inch soft white dots on a solid black background.

There's a trim of 'tea stain' coloured, heart patterned lace all round the belt which is finished off with a small black satin bow on the centre front waist.  There is a black satin bow above each of the back garters.

The front lace panel is tea-stain colour and self patterned with roses and flowers.

Supplied with 4 garters which are vintage style tea stain colour, satin fronted plush backed elastic with black metal adjusters.  They attach to the belt with black metal hooks.

The grips are black plastic with silver metal fronts.

Fastens at the back with a standard adjustable two hook and eye fastener.

This garter belt has a concealed plush elastic waistband which will stretch from 24 to 30 inches.  Best suited for sizes up to 28 inch waist.  I can custom make this in most sizes at no extra cost.  Just drop me a line to check availability and order turnaround time.

Shown here with contrasting black and white stripe knickers which aren't included in the sale but can be purchased or custom ordered separately.

name: Handmade Cotton Garter Belt Sexy Casanova Print With Black Lace And Satin Bows
description:
Handmade cotton garter belt in a decadent print evoking Venice in the time of Casanova. Closely packed male and female figures dressed for a masked ball in sumptuous costumes, wigs and masks. The suspender belt is edged in narrow black lace and has a flower patterned black lace front panel finished with a black satin bow.

There is a small black satin bow above each of the back garters.

The belt comes supplied with one set of garters: these are black satin fronted, plush backed elastic with black metal adjusters and hooks. The grips are black plastic with chrome fronts. All my garter belts have detachable garters to enable you to ring the changes.  

The belt has a concealed elastic waistband which will stretch from 24 inches to 32 inches. It doesn't look best fully stretched, though, and is most suited to waist sizes up to 30 inches. While fabric stocks last, I can make this to fit most sizes, at no extra cost. Please check availability before ordering

Fastens at the back with a standard two hook adjustable fastener similar to those used on bras.

Photographed with black and ivory Amour knickers, which are not included in the sale but can be purchased or custom ordered separately.

name: Black Halter Bra Retro All Cotton Gothic Victorian Curtain Print 34 to 36 Inch Bust (87 to 92cm)
description:
Handmade halter neck bra in an all cotton print of a slightly decadent and Gothic Victorian era heavily swagged and buttoned black curtain. The swags are accented in white.

The bra is soft and unstructured, and has no wires. It can be worn as underwear or sleepwear.

Lightly elasticated to ensure a comfortable fit, without gaping, it has a deep band and softly gathering cups which slightly overlap at the front and are finished with a black satin bow. There's an all round trim of elegant narrow black lace. It closes at the back with a standard 3 hook and eye adjustable fastener.

Photographed on a 34 inch (87cm) bust mannequin with a medium size cup (B-C). The underbust measurement is 32 inches (82cm) fully stretched. 

If you would like this is another size, please contact me to check availability. There's no extra charge for custom ordering.

Shown here with black and white pinstripe bloomers which aren't included in the sale, but can be purchased separately

name: Black Swan Panties All Cotton Handmade Black And White Knickers
description:
Black swan panties handmade in all cotton fabric. Elegant, stunning print of two black swans whose necks and heads together form a heart shape against a bright white background. 

There's an ivory coloured lace trim around the legs and waist, and a large black satin bow on the centre front waist.

The panties have a concealed elastic waistband, and a gusset lined in matching fabric.

This is now a MADE TO ORDER item, the original having sold. While I still have sufficient fabric, I can make in most sizes at no extra cost. Drop me a line to check availability before custom ordering. Custom orders usually take around 7-10 days to complete, and cost the same as ready made.

name: Handmade Wedding Knickers Butterflies And Peony Roses
description:
Perfect for a wedding day, all cotton handmade panties in a print that comes straight from an old English garden. Big, billowing blue and pink peony roses play host to multicoloured butterflies. The background is a textured ivory.

The knickers have a gusset lined in matching fabric, and a concealed plush elastic waistband. The waist and legs are edged in ivory lace, and the centre waist is adorned with a single ivory satin bow. 

This is a made to order item. Orders typically take 10 days to make, and if you are ordering for a special occasion, please leave sufficient time for delivery as well.

name: Vintage Style Camisole In 1930s Repro Cotton Flower Print Handmade Romantic Lingerie Or Sleep Top
description:
Romantic handmade vintage style camisole combining two all cotton flower prints. The bodice depicts large scale rose blooms and forget-me-not type flowers in saturated pastel shades of nude, blue, green and grey. The main body is a 1930s reproduction fabric of a small pattern of ivy leaf shaped motifs in pink, green and violet on ivory.

The bodice and hem are edged in pretty cream lace with a vintage appearance, and there is a small, ivory satin rose on either side of the hem and a double rosebud on the centre front bodice.

The straps are blush coloured, picot edged, satin fronted, plush backed elastic, with white metal adjusters.

The bodice is lightly elasticated to ensure a snug and comfortable fit without gaping.

Wear as lingerie or a sleep top. You can also wear it as outerwear.

This is ideal for UK sizes 10/12) (US 8/10) (bust 32 to 34 inches)(82-87cm) with a medium cup size bodice (B-C). It is photographed on a 34 bust model. Actual measurements are : underbust - 32 inches(82cm); all around at hem - 38 inches (97cm).  Length is 12 inches (31cm) along the centre back seam (which starts at approximately underarm level).

While fabric stocks last I can make in most sizes. Drop me a line first to check availability. There is no extra cost for custom orders.

Photographed with lilac and green striped sleep shorts which are not included in the sale, but are available to buy separately.

name: Paris Travel Laundry Bag Blue Paris Street Map Eiffel Tower Print
description:
A compact laundry bag, ideal for travel or household storage. It measures 15 inches by 20 inches (38x51cm) and closes with twisted cotton pull cords with knotted ends.

A combination of five blue toned prints imbued with the atmosphere and glamour of Paris.

The first and largest panel is a summery sky blue strewn with images of the Eiffel Tower, pavement cafes, Paris metro signs, and elegant poodles. The images are sketched in black and filled with white and pale blue. The Eiffel Towers are darker blue. There's a white cotton 'Swoon' label sewn into the lower right corner.

The next section is the narrowest. It's an elegant print of columns of black rosebuds and garlands of rose blooms on ivory.

Above it is a pretty 1930s style shabby chic print of posies of blue flowers encircled by garlands of tiny pink and blue flowers on a background of forget me not blue sprinkled with tiny white Swiss dots.

The top panel depicts a street map of Paris, sketched in pastels in shades of buttermilk, soft pink and blue. The main attractions are drawn and labelled,and there's a figure on a bicycle too!

The bag is finished with a collar of old fashioned harlequin diamonds in three shades of blue.

The inside seams are all neatly serged to prevent fraying.

Comes packaged for perfect gift giving.

name: Shabby Rose Handmade Knickers Pretty Old Fashioned Panties All Cotton Custom Sizes
description:
Romantic handmade underwear in two pretty all cotton prints.  These panties combine a nostalgic chintz rose print in soft pink and sage green hues with a print comprised of lines of handwritten script in sepia green on ivory, resembling fragments of a love letter.

Ideal for a wedding day or other romantic occasion.  The knickers have a soft, frothy ivory lace trim around the legs and waist, lined gusset, concealed soft elastic waistband, and are finished with a singled smoky satin rose on the centre front waist.

Shown here on a 35 inch hip mannequin, they are ideal for hip sizes 34 - 36 inches, but while I still have the fabrics available, I can make them at no extra cost to fit most sizes.  Just drop me a line to check availability before ordering, or to inquire about custom ordering matching items.

name: Shabby Rose Camiknickers Handmade Cotton Vintage Style Romper Made To Order
description:
Handmade cotton camiknickers or romper in two beautiful shabby chic rose prints. The bodice has big, billowy rose blooms in pink and cream with light green leaves and stems on ivory. The main body has a romantic Scottish look with columns of pink and green plaid separated by twisting vines dotted with posies of yellow, pink and green blooms against an ivory background.

The bodice and legs are trimmed in creamy ivory lace and there's a hot pink satin bow on the centre front bodice.

The straps are blush coloured, picot edged, satin fronted elastic with white metal adjusters. 

The gusset is lined in matching fabric, and the knickers fasten discreetly at the crotch with two concealed snap fasteners.

This is now a Made To Order item, the original photographed here having sold. While I still have the fabrics, I can make this in most sizes. Please contact me first to check availability. There is no extra charge for custom ordering.

Length along the centre back seam (which starts at approx underarm level) is approx 20 inches  (51cm).

Perfect for a wedding day or other romantic occasion. Wear as lingerie or sleepwear.

name: Shabby Rose Panties Handmade Cotton Duck Egg And Red Rose Knickers - Made To Order
description:
All cotton handmade panties in a classic shabby chic print of red and ivory roses on a duck egg blue background. Perfect as a something blue bridal item, or for any romantic occasion. The roses are in shades of red from deepest carmine to palest pink, with ivory and pale yellow blooms as well. The foliage is a silvery sage green. The background has a distressed appearance, like used linen.

The gusset is lined in matching fabric. The waistband is of concealed elastic. Legs and waist are edged in tea stain coloured scallop edged lace, and the centre waist is adorned with a single ivory satin bow.

This is now a made to order item, the original having sold. While fabric stocks last I can make in most sizes. Drop me a line to check availability, and arrange a custom order at no extra cost.

name: Handmade Cotton Garter Belt Suspender Belt Blue Wedding Print MADE TO ORDER
description:
A made to order wedding garter/suspender belt in a blue toned cotton print to cherish forever.  The print has the appearance of blue net lace on a white background overlaid with recurring motifs associated with a wedding day, including two wedding rings being carried strung on a ribbon by three bluebirds.  There are also images of old fashioned lily of the valley bridal bouquets, lace doilies and roses all in shades of soft blue and white.

The belt has a front panel of natural coloured, flower patterned lace with a slight surface sheen. It is finished off with a big, soft ivory satin bow. There's also an all round trim of blush coloured vintage style lace. It has a concealed plush elastic waistband, and fastens at the back with an adjustable two hook and eye fastener similar to those used on bras.

It comes with one set of garters: these are broad, baby blue satin fronted, plush-backed elastic with white plastic coated metal adjusters. The grips are vintage-style cream coloured plastic with matching metal fronts. They attach to the belt with white plastic coated metal hooks. All my garter belts have detachable garters to enable you to ring the changes. 

Shown here with Love Letters knickers, which are not included in the sale.

name: Camiknickers Handmade Vintage Style Ivory With Blue And Pink Flowers And Butterflies
description:
Romantic handmade vintage style camiknickers in two nostalgic flower prints that evoke the timeless beauty of an English country garden in summertime.

The bodice has a soft ivory background  adorned with pink and black butterflies, and large headed peony blooms in pink and blue with dark green stems and leaves, highlighted in white.

The main body print comprises vertical chevrons of small pink and blue flowers on an ivory background.

The legs and bodice are edged in scalloped ivory lace, and the bodice is adorned with a large ivory satin bow with trailing ends.

The straps are narrow, picot edged ivory satin-fronted, plush-backed elastic with white metal adjusters. 

The gusset is lined in matching fabric, and the knickers fasten discreetly at the crotch with two concealed snap fasteners.

These will fit UK size 10 to 12 (US 8 to 10): bust 34, hips 36-38 inches. The actual measurements are: underbust 32 inches, with a small to medium cup size bodice. At hip level the knickers measure approximately 40 inches. They aren't supposed to be worn tight. Length along the centre back seam (which starts at approx underarm level) is approx 20 inches.

If you would like these in a different size, you can custom order at no extra cost.  Just check with me first regarding availability.

name: Something Blue Wedding Panties Handmade All Cotton Blue And White Roses And Wedding Day Print
description:
Handmade wedding panties in two 100% cotton prints evoking the romance of the big day in shades of blue and white.  These are suitable for 34 inch hip to 36 inch hips, but can be custom ordered to fit most sizes at no extra cost.  Please leave plenty of time for your custom order to be made and shipped to you.

These bridal knickers comprise back and front sections with bridging sections at the sides.  The front and back print resembles blue net lace on an ivory background overlaid with romantic images of bouquets, bluebirds carrying two wedding rings strung on a ribbon, and ribbon bestrewed church bells.

The side sections are a nostalgic shabby rose print in blue with green stems and leaves against an ivory background.   They have a very soft ivory lace trim around the legs and waist, and a concealed plush elastic waistband. The gusset is lined in the wedding print.

There's a single small blue satin rose to finish off the centre front.

name: Short Bloomers Retro Style Panties Brown And White Harlequin Diamond Print Cotton
description:
Short bloomers to wear as underwear, sleepwear or street wear. Handmade in an all cotton retro print of  brown and ivory harlequin diamonds.

The bloomers have a comfortable, plush elastic concealed waistband, and elasticated legs. The waist and legs are trimmed in beige scallop edged lace. 

Not meant to be tight, these are suitable for 34 to 36 inch hips (87-92 cm) (my mannequin is a 35 inch hip). The waist will stretch from 22 inches to 34 inches (56 to 87cm). Stocks of this fabric are low, but while sufficient remains I can make these in other sizes at no extra cost. Drop me a line first to check availability.

Photographed with matching camisole, which is not included in this sale but can be purchased separately.

name: Dog Print Garter Belt Mid Century Sky Blue Cute Terrier Cotton And Lace Handmade
description:
Cute cotton garter belt in 100% cotton print, featuring a red collared, patch-eyed terrier cavorting on a bright sky blue background. There is a frothy creamy coloured lace front panel and all round trim, and a deep red satin bow on the front waist, and tiny coffee coloured satin bows on the back garters. The garters are detachable, enabling you to ring the changes with different coloured garters - (see the sky blue satin ones for instance). You can buy spare and replacement sets from me. 
These are blush coloured, picot edged, satin fronted, plush backed elastic with white metal hooks and adjusters. The grips are very retro creamy coloured plastic with white metal fronts.

The belt closes with a standard two hook adjustable back fastener. It has a plush elastic waistband which will stretch from 22 to 32 inches (56-82 cm), but isn't meant to be worn fully stretched; I can make this in most sizes as no extra cost; just drop me a line first to check that sufficient stock of the fabric remains, and I will be happy to make you a custom order at no extra cost.

Photographed with pretty rosebud knickers which are not included in the sale, but can be purchased separately on request.

name: Rabbit Print Camisole Handmade Vintage Style Damask And Harlequin Print Sea Green Brown And Cream
description:
Handmade all cotton vintage style camisole to wear as underwear, sleepwear or street wear.  The bodice print is a damask print formed from rabbit silhouettes in soft brown on a background of seafoam green sprinkled with tiny white dots.

The lower portion is a classic harlequin print in soft brown and ivory.

There's a vintage style creamy lace trim around the bodice and hem and a small ivory satin double rose bow on the centre front bodice.

The straps are narrow, ivory, picot edged, satin-fronted, plush backed elastic with white metal adjusters.

This will fit UK sizes 10/12 ( US 8/10) (bust 32 to 34 inches) with a medium cup size bodice (B to C). It is photographed on a 34 inch bust mannequin. Actual measurements are : underbust - 32 inches; all around at hem - 38 inches. The length along the centre back seam (which starts at approximately underarm level) is approximately 12 inches.

Unfortunately I no longer have the fabric supplies necessary to remake this in other sizes.

Shown here with matching mini bloomers, which are not included in the sale but can be purchased separately.

name: Dog Print Sleep Mask Handmade Padded All Cotton Grey With Pink Poodle And Black Scottie
description:
Handmade all cotton thickly padded sleep mask comprising two adorable prints.  The front is a grey background with screen printed images of a bright pink poodle, a scottie dogs (black of course) and a chihuahua (also black).  

The backing print resembles black lace against a white background.  

In between the top and bottom layers are three more of ultra soft cotton flannel for a luxuriously soft, comfortable and light excluding experience.

The mask stays in place with a loop of elastic covered in matching cotton fabric.

Measurements are approx 9 inches in length, and 3.5 inches in breadth at the widest point. Unstretched the back loop measures approx 14 inches; fully stretched, it's about 24 inches. 

Masks are available in hundreds of prints, and there is no extra charge for custom ordering. Just drop me a line and I will be happy to send you some photo swatches to help you make your choice.

Comes ideally packaged for gift giving in a close fitting plastic sleeve with backing card detailing fabric content and washing instructions.

Launder by hand in cool water and dry flat.

name: Pink Gingham Cotton Sleep Shorts For Women Handmade Retro Style With Lace And Bow Trim
description:
Handmade soft pink gingham all cotton sleep shorts for women.  Adorable retro styling.  The shorts have a white cotton lace trim around the waist and legs, and a pretty pink satin bow on the front waist.
 
The have a comfortable concealed elastic waistband.  Made to be worn low slung on the hips, the waistband will stretch from 27 inches to 30 inches. Actual hip measurement is 40 inches.

Shown here on a 25 inch waist, 35 inch hip mannequin, these are suitable for hip sizes 34 to 38 depending on how loose or tight you want them to be. While I have sufficient fabric stocks, I can make these to fit most sizes at no extra cost. Please check with me first regarding availability.

name: Dog Print Nightgown Retro Handmade Cotton Nightdress With Eyelet Lace Trim
description:
Cute retro yoked nightgown handmade in two lightweight all cotton prints. The yoke depicts various dogs in bubblegum pink and white with black markings on a soft slate grey background. The main body is a 1930s style print of dark grey hatched lines forming boxes containing a flower like shape in dove grey and pink on ivory background. There are also smaller flower shapes on the points where the hatched lines intersect.

The neck, yoke, armholes and hem are edged with ivory coloured cotton eyelet lace embroidered with self coloured heart shapes. There's a big, soft ivory satin bow on the centre front yoke.

This is the small size; photographed on a 34 inch bust model (87cm), the actual chest measurement (all round under the arms) is 40 inches (102cm); hip measurement is approx 44 inches (112cm), and the length along the centre back from nape to hem is approx 31 inches (79cm). These nightgowns are supposed to be loose, and so this item is best suited to 32 - 36 inch bust (82 - 92cm)  . My model is 6 foot tall, so this will be slightly longer on shorter girls. 

While fabric stocks last I can make in other sizes; just drop me a quick message first to check availability,or if you'd like to custom order in different fabrics. Custom orders cost the same as ready made.

name: Pink Polka Dot Suspender Belt Handmade 50s Style All Cotton Medium And Custom Sizes
description:
Handmade saucy garter belt.  Retro style 1950s white polka dots on hot pink.  The dots are half an inch across, and the print is 100% cotton.

The front panel is white lace with a flower pattern and is adorned with a hot pink satin bow.  There's a trim of white lace all around the belt, and a white satin bow above each of the back garters.   

All my garter belts come with detachable garters to enable you to ring the changes.  This belt is supplied with a set of four hot pink satin fronted plush backed garters with white metal adjusters. They attach via white metal hooks. The grips are white plastic with chrome clasps. 

The suspender belt has a concealed plush elastic waistband, and fastens at the back with an adjustable fastener similar to the type used on bras.

The waist will extend from 24 to 32 inches but is ideally suited to waist sizes up to 28 inches. It's shown here on a 25 waist model.    While I still have the fabrics stocks, I can make this to fit most sizes.   Custom orders cost the same as ready made. Please check with me concerning availability before placing your order.

name: Boudoir Sleepmask Pink Black White French Words, Gingham, Spots And Harlequin Print
description:
Stylish all cotton padded sleepmask in the classic boudoir combination of pink, black and white. The mask combines two matching prints, with three layers of soft cotton flannel between, guaranteeing superior comfort and light exclusion.

The front print has bands of pattern running horizontally across the mask. They include black and white small check gingham, a band of hot pink and black harlequin diamonds, another of different sized circles filled with various shades of pink and black, and the band in the centre has words and short phrases in French, written in jaunty black script, separated by small pink hearts. The script reads: 'enchantes', 'tu es belle', 'bonjour' and 'mon' .

The backing print is entirely the hot pink and black diamond pattern. 

The mask stays firmly but comfortably in place with a loop of sturdy elastic covered in matching fabric, for enhanced good looks. The pattern on the loop covering is pink and white gingham.

The sleepmask masures approx 9 inches in length, and 3.5 inches in breadth at the widest point. Unstretched the back loop measures approx 14 inches; fully stretched, it's about 24 inches.

name: Pink Damask Bloomers Short Leg All Cotton Handmade 36 inch Hips With Lace Trim
description:
Classic hot pink damask women's mini bloomers.  These retro granny panties are a flattering short leg design.  There's a lace trim around the legs and waist and a pretty hot pink satin bow on the front waist.

Wear as underwear or sleepwear, or flaunt beneath a summer dress.

Not meant to be tight, these are suitable for 34 to 36 inch hips (my mannequin is a 35 hip). The waist will stretch from 22 inches to 34 inches. The actual measurement across the widest part of the hips is 38 inches.

Unfortunately I no longer have sufficient supplies of this fabric to make these in other sizes.

name: Scottie Dog Nightdress 32 to 36 Bust Handmade Black White Red Cotton With Black Eyelet Lace
description:
Handmade nightdress in two bold vintage style prints. The yoke has large scale (3 inches high) scottie dogs wearing cosy plaid scarves against a background of red stripes on ivory. The neck and lower edge of the yoke are trimmed in black cotton eyelet lace with a satiny edge. There's a small black plastic scottie button on one side of the yoke.

The main body of the nightie is a classic gingham print in black and ivory, with red hearts and white snowflake like motifs in some of the ivory squares. The armholes and hem are trimmed in the same black eyelet lace. All fabrics are 100% cotton.

Photographed on a 34 inch bust mannequin, the actual measurements are: chest (all round under the arms) 40 inches; at hip level approx 44 inches, and the length along the centre back from nape to hem is approx 31 inches. These nightgowns are supposed to be loose, and so this item is best suited to 32 - 36 inch bust. My model is 6 foot tall, so this will appear slightly longer on shorter girls. 

While fabric stocks last I can make in other sizes; just drop me a quick message first to check availability,or if you'd like to custom order in different fabrics. Custom orders cost the same as ready made.

name: Red London Bus Handmade Cotton Laundry Bag Compact Travel Size
description:
A laundry bag that is perfectly sized for travel. At 15 x 20 inches (38 x 51cm)  it will carry all your tee shirts, shorts and underthings home in style. And when not on holiday you can use it for pretty home storage of belts, scarves, socks etc.

There are five different all cotton prints combined in this sweet, nostalgic bag, all of which evoke an England of gentler times. All seams are serged for neatness and to prevent fraying, and there is a 'Swoon' label sewn onto the front lower right corner.

The first section is a screen print of an old style Routemaster red London bus against a white background.

Above that is a narrow panel of vertical stripes of blue and white gingham with dotted edges alternated with vertical garlands of tiny red roses on white.

Next is a section of classic chintzy style billowing roses: large scale, lipstick red blooms with fresh green stems and leaves, surrounded by smaller creamy coloured flowers against a white background scattered with palest pink barely discernible polka dots.

The final panel is a classic blue and white check.

The bag has a collar of a 1930s reproduction print of ivory background strewn with circles in varying sizes in shades of red and blue, with some entirely filled with colour.

Closes with pull cords of soft twisted cotton, knotted at the ends.

name: Eiffel Tower Panties 34 To 36 inch Hip (87 to 92cm) Handmade Cotton Deep Red On Ivory Knickers
description:
Romantic Eiffel Tower panties handmade in cotton print depicting rows of towers in burgundy on ivory background. The knickers have an ivory lace trim around the legs and waist and a burgundy satin bow on the front waist. The gusset is lined in matching fabric.

They have a concealed elastic waistband.

Suitable for 34-36 inch hips (87 to 92cm). Photographed on a 35 inch hip mannequin. 

While fabric stocks last I can make in most sizes at no extra cost. Just drop me a line first to check availability.

name: Handmade Sleepmask Vintage Style Cats On Red Gingham All Cotton Luxury Padded Eye Mask
description:
All cotton handmade sleepmask in a vintage style cat print with a red gingham background.  The cats are a brown and white and all white, sitting together and each with a blue bow around its neck.  The background is small check red and creamy ivory gingham.

There are three layers of soft fluffy flannel between the front and back of the mask, which is a 1930s reproduction print of ivory coloured daisies on a blue background.

All fabrics (including the flannel) are 100% cotton.

The mask stays firmly in place with a loop of elastic covered in matching fabric, for added good looks.

Measurements are approx 9 inches in length, and 3.5 inches in breadth at the widest point. Unstretched the back loop measures approx 14 inches; fully stretched, it's about 24 inches. 

If you would like to commission a similar mask in a different print or with a different backing (including satin options) I will be happy to send photo swatches to help you make your choice. There is no extra charge for custom ordering.

Comes ideally packaged for gift giving in a close fitting plastic sleeve with cardboard backing.

name: Womens Short Bloomers Handmade Cotton Red And White Stripe Vaudeville Style
description:
Women's short bloomer panties in classic brick red and soft ivory stripes.  Fabric is 100% cotton as is the ivory eyelet (broderie anglais) lace that trims the waist and legs.  The lace is embroidered with self coloured hearts.

The versatile mini bloomers can be worn as sleepwear or beachwear or to flaunt beneath your summer frocks.

They have a concealed plush elastic waistband

 Not meant to be tight, these are suitable for 34 to 36 inch hips (my mannequin is a 35 hip). The waist will stretch from 24 inches to 34 inches. While fabric stocks allow, I can make to fit most sizes. Please check with me first regarding availability. Custom orders cost the same as ready made.

name: Retro Red Gingham Camisole With Frilled Hem And Cat Print 34 inch Bust (87cm)
description:
Cute retro all cotton handmade camisole depicting pampered kitties reclining on a red gingham background.

Wear as underwear, sleepwear or streetwear.

The bodice is a print of half inch white dots closely and symmetrically arranged against a blue background. It is trimmed with vintage style lace in a tea-stain colour with a rose pattern. There's a baby blue heart shaped button on the centre front.

The main body of the camisole is a retro print of small red and ivory checks overlaid with images of two very pampered looking cats, one white and one brown and white, each with a lavish blue bow around its neck, snuggled together contentedly. There's a richly pleated frill of matching fabric around the lower edge.

The straps are light blue, satin fronted, plush backed elastic with white metal adjusters. 

This will fit bust size 34 inches (87cm) with a small to medium cup size bodice. It is photographed on a 34 bust mannequin. The actual measurements are: underbust : 32 inches (82cm), all around at hem (which is hip skimming) 38 inches (97cm); length along the centre back seam (which starts at around underarm level) 13 inches (33cm). 

While fabric stocks last I can make this in most sizes. Drop me a line first to check availability. There is no extra cost for custom ordering.

Photographed with matching blue and white bloomer panties which are not included in the sale but which are available separately.

name: Coral Garter Belt Magenta Exotic Birds Flowers Toile Cotton Retro Modern Lingerie
description:
Coral toile garter belt. Stunning magenta and white exotic flowers and birds print on coral pink background. Retro styling with matching detachable garters. Belt has natural coloured lace front panel, scallop lace trim and big soft ivory satin bow.

The belt fastens at the back with an adjustable fastener similar to the type used on bras.

The waist will extend from 22 to 32 inches (56 - 82cm), but is ideally suited to waist sizes up to 28 inches (71cm). It's shown here on a 25 waist model. While fabric stocks last, I can make this in most sizes at no extra cost. 

All my garter belts come with detachable garters to enable you to ring the changes. You can purchase extra sets here.   This belt is supplied with a set of four dark coral, satin fronted plush backed garters with white metal adjusters. They attach via white metal hooks. The grips are cream coloured plastic with cream painted metal clasps. 

Photographed here with tan and red ribbon knickers, which are not included in the sale but can be purchased separately.

name: Eiffel Tower Sleepmask Red On White With Striped Contrast Handmade Cotton Eye Mask
description:
Handmade cotton sleepmask padded with soft luxurious flannel. Front print is of deep red Eiffel Towers against ivory white background. The backing is a classic brick red and ivory narrow stripe. There are three layers of flannel in between, guaranteeing superior comfort and light exclusion.

All fabrics are 100% cotton.

A loop of sturdy elastic covered in matching cotton fabric holds the mask firmly but comfortably in place. 

Measurements are approx 9 inches (23cm) in length, and 3.5 inches (9cm) in breadth at the widest point. Unstretched the back loop measures approx 14 inches (36cm); fully stretched, it's about 24 inches (61cm). 

Masks are available in hundreds of prints, and there is no extra charge for custom ordering. Just drop me a line and I will be happy to send you some photo swatches to help you make your choice.

Comes ideally packaged for gift giving in a close fitting plastic sleeve with backing card detailing fabric content and washing instructions.

Launder by hand in cool water and dry flat.

name: Handmade Knickers All Cotton Exotic Birds And Flowers Salmon Pink Combination Print 36 Inch Hip
description:
Handmade women's knickers in two all cotton prints.  This composite design combines a modern version of a classic toile depicting exotic birds, flowers and foliage in a deep magenta with white accents against a background of rich salmon pink, with side panels which are a reproduction print from the 1930s - what's known as 'feedsack prints' - of a salmon or coral coloured background strewn with small daisy type flowers in ivory and magenta.  The two combine together very prettily.

The panties have a gusset lined in the main (toile) print, a concealed soft elastic waistband, and a waist and leg trim of vintage style light peach coloured lace.  The centre front waist is finished with a peach satin bow.

Shown here on a 35inch hip mannequin, these are ideal for hip sizes 34 to 36 inches.  While fabric stocks last I can make to fit most sizes at no extra cost.  Just drop me a line first to check availability and turn around times.

name: Yellow Polka Dot Panties All Cotton Retro Style Knickers With Heart Print Lace
description:
1950s style polka dot panties in a sunny yellow and white 100% cotton print. The dots are slightly off-white for a more vintage style look, and measure 1/4 inch. There's a frothy 'tea stain' coloured lace trim around the legs and waist that has a romantic heart pattern and a slight surface sheen. The centre front waist is finished with a 'tea stain' coloured rose. The gusset is lined in matching fabric.

The knickers have a concealed plush elastic waistband which will fit from 24 inches (unstretched) to 32 inches (fully stretched). Best suited for waists up to 28 inches, and hip sizes 34-37 inches. It's photographed here on a 25 waist/35 hip mannequin. While sufficient fabric remains, I can make in most sizes. Please drop me a line first to check availability. There is no extra charge for custom ordering.

name: Laundry Bag For Travel Handmade All Cotton Wedding Theme Retro Style
description:
Handmade travel size laundry bag or lingerie bag ideal for a honeymoon or romantic trip.  It measures 15 inches wide by 20 inches long, and is made up - scrapbag style - of five nostalgic all cotton prints.  It closes with soft cotton draw cords with knotted ends.

The panels vary in width, and the bag is finished with a contrasting collar.

The first and widest section is a romantic retro print that tells in words and pictures why the bride featured there finds her husband-to-be so irresistible; eg 'One couldn't call him a live wire; he'll never set the world on fire; but he can sweep her off her feet; it's wedding bells and bridal suite!' being just one example.  The images have a 1950s  style and are all coloured in shades of violet blue, deep mustard yellow and dark red with a splash of green and black. The front and back panels of this section are different. You can see an image of the back panel on the fourth photograph. 

Next is a narrow panel of white on blue one inch polka dots. The front version of this panel has a white cotton 'Swoon' label to one side.

Above that is a wider section of yellow and white checks with diagonal black lines forming a hatched design.

And then a panel of bright sunny faces in pinky yellow surrounded by aqua sunrays on a bold yellow background.

The bag is finished off with a collar depicting in navy blue on white images of 1940s housewives doing their laundry.

All seams are serged for neatness and to prevent fraying.

Comes packaged for perfect gift giving.

name: Bloomers Short Leg Handmade Cotton Yellow Pin Stripe Cute Indie Underwear
description:
Wear these cute saucy mini bloomers as underwear, sleepwear or flash beneath your skirts and dresses.  All cotton handmade short leg bloomer panties in a crisp sunny yellow print with a dark grey pinstripe along the centre of a broader white stripe.

There's a waist and leg trim of ivory lace, and an ivory satin bow on the front.  The waist is concealed and made from comfortable plush elastic.

These bloomers are best worn slightly loose.   They are shown here on a 35 inch hip mannequin.  The actual measurements at the hip level is 39 inches.   The waist will stretch from 22 inches to 34 inches. While fabric stocks allow, I can make to fit most sizes. Please check with me first regarding availability. Custom orders cost the same as readymade.

name: Elegant Suspender Belt Handmade Cotton Chintz Roses On Duck Egg Blue
description:
Elegant handmade cotton suspender belt (garter belt) capturing the romance of old roses in a chintz style on a duck egg blue background.  The soft red roses have sage green stems and leaves and are bunched together with a wilder looking bloom resembling campion.   

The garter belt has an ivory flower patterned lace front panel, and an all round trim of blush coloured satin edged lace. The centre front waist has a small ivory bow.

The garters are blush coloured picot edged satin fronted elastic with a plush backing. They attach to the belt with small white metal hooks. All my garter belts have detachable garters to enable you to ring the changes.  The grips are vintage style creamy ivory plastic with ivory painted metal fronts.

The belt has a concealed elastic waistband which will stretch from 22 inches to 32 inches. It will look best on waist sizes up to 28 inches. If you'd like a larger or smaller size, I'll be happy to set you up a custom order at no extra cost. Please check with me first that I still have sufficient stock of materials.

name: Teal Romper Butterfly And Damask Romantic Camiknickers Handmade Vintage Style Lingerie
description:
Teal romper to wear as lingerie or sleepwear.  These vintage style camiknickers are handmade in two contrasting all cotton prints.  The main body print is of large tone on tone teal butterflies with white and darker teal markings, while the print used for the bodice is a classic damask in a lighter sea foam colour on a soft ivory background.

There's an aqua coloured, rose-patterned, scalloped lace trim around the bodice and legs, and a sumptuous teal satin bow on the front bodice with long trailing ends. 

The straps are narrow, teal coloured satin fronted, plush backed elastic with white metal adjusters. The bodice is softly elasticated for a snug fit with no gaping. The knickers have a discreet crotch fastening with matching fabric lining.

This will fit bust sizes 32 to 34 inches (it's photographed on a 34 bust model) with a small to medium size bodice (A to B cup). Actual measurements are : underbust - 32 inches; at hip level approx 40 inches, with length measured along the centre back seam (which starts at approx underarm level) approx 20 inches.

Unfortunately this print is now discontinued, so I am unable to offer this in other sizes.

name: Japanese Knickers 1920s Geisha Print Cotton Handmade Panties Various Sizes
description:
Japanese print handmade cotton panties.  This is a particularly soft, lightweight cotton.  The colours are muted, vintage style hues of earth tones with magenta on ivory.  The back and front show different images of a man and woman dressed in 1920s style clothing, surrounded by abstract flower shapes reminiscent of light coloured dahlias.

The gusset is lined in matching fabric.  The legs and waist are edged in narrow ivory lace, and there's a concealed plush elastic waistband.  The centre front is finished with a small ivory satin bow.

This is ideal for hips 34-36 inches. It is photographed on 35 inch hip mannequin. 

While fabric stocks last, I can make in most sizes. Please contact me first to check availability. There is no extra charge for custom ordering.

name: Womens Cotton Sleep Shorts Orange And White Stripe Handmade Short Pajama Pants
description:
Handmade cotton sleep shorts for women in crisp white with narrow orange and white stripes, and a very fine black pinstripe.  There's a white cotton eyelet lace trim around the waist and legs.  The concealed waistband is plush elastic.

Team with a vest or tee shirt for cool and comfortable sleep wear  The high cut legs make them flattering to all body shapes and allow for ease of movement.

This is the small to medium size - suitable for up to 38 inch hip. Photographed on a 25 waist, 35 hip model. The actual measurements are : waist (fully stretched) 38 inches, hips 40 inches.

While fabric stocks last I can make to suit most sizes. Drop me a line first to check availability, or to order in a different print. There is no extra charge for custom orders.

name: Handmade Sleepmask Red With Gold Script Luxury Padded Travel Mask
description:
Romantic handmade sleepmask in two luxurious cotton prints with three layers of soft flannel padding to guarantee superior comfort and light exclusion. Ideal for Christmas holiday travel or gifting.

The front fabric is a shadowy red overlaid with intriguing spidery handwritten script in lustrous gold, which on close inspection is actually random strings of letters which may or may not represent a lovers' secret code. The backing print is a detail from a Victorian swagged curtain: lavish pink swags and bows against a light tan background.

A loop of sturdy elastic, covered in matching cotton fabric keeps the mask firmly in place.

The measurements are approx 9 inches in length, and 3.5 inches in breadth at the widest point. Unstretched the back loop measures approx 14 inches; fully stretched, it's about 24 inches. 

Comes ideally packaged for gift giving in a close fitting plastic sleeve with 'Sweet Dreams' cardboard backing which also gives washing instructions (hand wash in cool water) .

name: Handmade Halter Bralette Soft Cotton With Vintage Style Scottie Dogs
description:
Handmade halter bralette in a soft unstructured style made from an all cotton reproduction 1930s scottie dog print.

The tan coloured scotties are shown in red plaid coats against a  background of tan Swiss dots on plain ivory.

The bra has a narrow, ivory lace trim around its entire perimeter, and the centre front is finished with a red gingham bow.

It closes at the back with a traditional three hook adjustable fastener.

Wear as underwear, sleepwear or even with your shorts or jeans as outerwear.

Photographed on a 34 inch bust mannequin with a medium size cup (B). The underbust measurement is 32 inches (fully stretched), making it suitable for 32-36 inch bust sizes with a medium cup.

While fabric stocks last I can make this to fit most sizes. Please check regarding availability before ordering. There is no extra charge for custom orders.

name: Black Damask Cotton Camiknickers Handmade 1930s Style Underwear
description:
Vintage style camiknickers in a combination of two bold modern all cotton prints. This handmade romper can be worn as lingerie or sleepwear. Elegantly sexy, it is flattering to all ages and body shapes. The main body is a stunning Japanese damask in a large scale white on black design of trailing leaves and abstract thistle-like flowers. The bodice depicts closely arranged figures in baroque costumes at a masked ball in chalky pastel shades of pink, blue and red with strong black accents.

The bodice and legs are edged with black lace, and the centre bodice is finished with a black satin bow with long trailing ends.

The straps are broad, black satin-fronted, plush-backed elastic with black metal adjusters. 

The gusset is lined in matching fabric, and the knickers fasten discreetly at the crotch with two concealed snap fasteners.

These will fit UK size 10-12 (US 8-10) bust 34 inches (87cm) , hips 36-38 inches (92 - 92cm). The actual measurements are: underbust 32 inches (82cm), with a medium cup size bodice . At hip level the knickers measure approximately 38 inches (92cm). Length along the centre back seam (which starts at approx underarm level) is approx 20 inches (51cm).

Photographed on 34 bust, 36 inch hip mannequin.

While fabric stocks allow, I can make in most sizes. Please contact me first to check availability. Custom orders cost the same as ready made.

name: Black Garter Belt Handmade All Cotton Rose Print Elegant Lingerie
description:
Handmade cotton garter belt in an elegant grey tonal print of large scale roses.

There is a black, flower patterned front panel and black lace trim around the entire belt.  The front is finished with a black satin bow.

The suspender belt fastens at the back with a two hook adjustable fastener similar to the type used on bras.

The waist will extend from 22 to 32 inches but is ideally suited to waist sizes up to 28 inches. It's shown here on a 25 waist mannequin. While fabric stocks last, I can make this in most sizes at no extra cost. 

All my garter belts come with detachable garters to enable you to ring the changes. This belt is supplied with a set of four black, satin fronted plush backed garters with black metal adjusters. They attach via black metal hooks. The grips are black coloured plastic with chrome clasps. 

Photographed with black tapestry print knickers, which are not included in the sale, but are available to order separately.

name: Short Leg Bloomers Handmade Black White And Grey Check All Cotton Granny Panties
description:
Cool indie short leg bloomers to wear as sleepwear or flash under your skirts and frocks.  Handmade all cotton classic diagonal check in urban shades of grey white and black.  The bloomers have a sexy black lace trim around the legs and waist, and the front waist is finished with a hot pink satin bow.  Waistband is concealed plush elastic.

 Not meant to be tight, these are best suited for 34 to 36 inch hips (my mannequin is a 35 hip). The actual measurement at hip level is approx 40 inches.  The waist will stretch from 24 inches to 34 inches. While fabric stocks allow, I can make to fit most sizes. Please check with me first regarding availability. Custom orders cost the same as ready made.
